projects.title: AML Engine
projects.subtitle: Financial Compliance Platform
projects.description: Enterprise-grade financial compliance system processing millions of transactions daily with advanced ML algorithms.
projects.longDescription: The AML Engine represents a breakthrough in financial compliance technology, designed to meet the rigorous demands of global financial institutions. This enterprise-grade platform processes millions of transactions daily, utilizing advanced machine learning algorithms to identify suspicious patterns and ensure regulatory compliance.

features.title: Real-time Monitoring
features.description: Continuous transaction monitoring with sub-second latency, enabling immediate detection and response to suspicious activities.

features.title: ML-Powered Detection
features.description: Advanced machine learning algorithms that continuously learn and adapt to new fraud patterns, improving detection accuracy over time.

features.title: Regulatory Compliance
features.description: Built-in compliance with international AML regulations including FATF, EU directives, and US banking regulations.

features.title: Advanced Analytics
features.description: Comprehensive reporting and analytics dashboard providing insights into risk patterns, compliance metrics, and system performance.

features.title: Secure Integration
features.description: Enterprise-grade security with API-first architecture, enabling seamless integration with existing banking systems and third-party services.

features.title: Scalable Architecture
features.description: Microservices-based architecture designed to handle millions of transactions with horizontal scaling capabilities and fault tolerance.

devQuotes: Yeah, I built that. Want one too?
The Iron Man suit of fraud detection
Processing transactions faster than you can say 'compliance'

projects.title: IoT Automation Hub
projects.subtitle: Smart Home Platform
projects.description: Comprehensive home automation system with AI-powered scheduling and advanced security features.
projects.longDescription: Comprehensive home automation system with AI-powered scheduling, voice control integration, and advanced security features. Enables seamless control of lighting, climate, security, and entertainment systems.

screenshots.title: Smart Home Dashboard
screenshots.description: Centralized control interface for all connected devices

features.title: AI-Powered Scheduling
features.description: Machine learning algorithms that learn user preferences and automatically optimize home automation schedules.

features.title: Voice Control Integration
features.description: Seamless integration with popular voice assistants for hands-free home control.

features.title: Advanced Security
features.description: Multi-layered security with biometric authentication and encrypted communication protocols.

features.title: Device Compatibility
features.description: Support for 100+ smart home devices and protocols including Zigbee, Z-Wave, and WiFi.

devQuotes: Don't worry, I'm human â€” and probably debugging with caffeine right now.
Making your home smarter than your phone
Automation so smooth, you'll forget it's there

projects.title: Data Analytics Platform

projects.longDescription: Advanced business intelligence platform with real-time dashboards, predictive analytics, and automated reporting capabilities. Designed for enterprise organizations requiring deep insights into their data.

features.title: Predictive Analytics

projects.title: Mobile Banking App
projects.subtitle: FinTech Solution
projects.description: Modern mobile banking application with biometric authentication and comprehensive financial management tools.
projects.longDescription: Modern mobile banking application with biometric authentication, real-time transactions, and comprehensive financial management tools. Built for the digital-first banking experience.

screenshots.title: Main Dashboard
screenshots.description: Overview of accounts, balances, and recent transactions

screenshots.title: Transaction Interface

features.title: Real-time Transactions
features.description: Instant payment processing and real-time balance updates.

features.title: Financial Management
